::DevilDuer::

DevilDuer nods, taking the cuffs and putting them in the machine, and 
then looking at the wires sticking from Diamond's wrists.

"You allright?" he asks, looking at her.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Diamond::
> 
> She looked at him and frowned.  She turned to cutting the other 
cuff 
> off,"Yeah, you did." she said in a dismayed voice.
> 
> She finally got the other cuff off.  She had had to disconnect the 
> wires from her right wrist cuff that connected to her wrist.  She 
> walked over to Devilduer, and handed him the two cuff. Two wires 
were 
> dangling down a few inches from her wrist. "Here, you can recyle 
> these if you want.  They are useless to me."
